mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_rental (cr_num, cr_mid, cr_cname, cr_rdate, cr_sdate, cr_edate, cr_price) VALUES (cr_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cr_mid}, #{cr_cname}, #{cr_rdate}, #{cr_sdate}, #{cr_edate}, #{cr_price})

mapper.update: update c_rental set cr_price = #{cr_price} where cr_num = #{cr_num}
